channel.title: Need help quicky please! [Detailed]!
channel.description:
EVERY F*CKING source i download, i always get the same damn error while trying to compile Which is:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/fw5b45.png[/img]
[b]But if i change my directory to where my java and bin is at, i get this error:[/b]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ap7goj.png[/img]
Any help is appreciated..

item.title: Need help quicky please! [Detailed]!
item.dc:creator: @cannon_s cannon s.
item.description:
@cannon_s wrote:

use my compiler

@echo off
@TITLE ANYName
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You Havent Downloaded Java!...
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
